values:
This journal is now on a permanent hiatus.

Thank you for making the time I had here fun!

Sheeplike, I follow. 

Am opening this one all the way up. Anon commenting ONLY. 

Tell me anything. Tell me your secret, ask me a question, say the thing you've always wanted to, even if it's not to me. Probably will be a one time thing, will never ever do again.
Thank you to the anonymous donor for the chocolates! Glad they're the good kind. *G*

I am cutting someone from my friend's list. I don't want to go into particulars. Just know that this person has proven themselves to be both ethically and legally irresponsible. I want nothing more to do with this person until this person has actually resolved the current situation. This has been a really, really sucky week for me, as well as for all concerned. I may be disappearing from LJ for a while.

All the entries in this LJ are locked. If you're curious, feel free to friend me. I check my list every week or so, and will friend you back when I see you. No need to email or ask permission.

Also -- feel free to defriend this LJ at any time. I will automatically defriend back.
